main.name: Deepak Kumar
main.shortDesc: A Software Developer specializing in backend technologies. With a strong foundation in C, C++, Python, and expertise in Next.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, I've excelled in developing robust and scalable solutions.

about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.about: Hello, I'm Deepak Kumar, a Computer Science and Engineering student at C.V Raman Global University. I bring a robust skill set in C, C++, Python, Java, and Javascript, with hands-on experience as a Software Developer Intern at PatAlgo. Proficient in Next.js, React.js, and MongoDB, I've developed feature-rich projects like an eCommerce Admin Panel and Quiz Funnel. As a top 1% qualifier in the Facebook HackerCup 2022 and CodeChef 3-star rating holder, I'm passionate about competitive programming, solved more than 800 DSA problem accross multiple platform. I've also contributed to open-source projects during Outreachy'22 spring cohort and Hacktoberfest'22. Eager to bring my problem-solving skills to impactful tech projects. I'm constantly pushing myself to learn and grow as a developer. Love building robust and scalable applications.

desc: Contributed to Padhigh.com, an educational platform with curriculum-aligned videos.
Focused on ensuring responsive design across devices (phone, tab, desktop).
Collaborated on feature integration and optimized page performance.

experiences.company: IIT Roorkee (Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee)
desc: Reviewed OAI 5G codebase, ensuring compliance standards and identified areas for refinement to enhance performance

Led code review reports and offered actionable recommendations to the team for codebase improvement, which resulted in a remarkable 30% reduction in bug-related issues, ensured enhanced software quality.
Collaborated with team members using version control systems such as Git to organize modifications and assign tasks
Worked under the guidance of Prof. Ekant Sharma, a leading expert in the field of 5G technology

Developed user-friendly website, resulting in 85% increase in online visibility and improved search rankings. And also integrated secure payment gateway (Stripe), which has led to a smooth checkout process and increased sales by 35%

Implemented an advanced admin panel and interactive dashboards to streamline operations, that boost productivity and achieve data-driven results, resulting in a remarkable 20% growth and driving significant customer satisfaction.

Leveraged server-side rendering and employed SEO techniques, resulting in a significant 59% reduction in page load time from 4.5 seconds to an impressive 1.85 seconds, enhancing user experience and driving increased website engagement.
Upgraded API versions from v1 to v3, results in optimized data retrieval speed, a 13% decrease in overall instance load, and enhanced overall system performance to efficiently meet user demands.
Skills: Nextjs · MongoDB · RestApi · AWS · Figma
